name: Nexa
description:
Welcome! We are developers at the Nexa project, hoping to take the future in a brand-new direction. Your imagination is the limit! As long as you have preordered our upcoming release! We want to thank the people involved:

Icemarv14 - Art

Jerrybipbip - Music & SFX

Coolingcomic - Story and dialogues

orion_black - Programming

A Festive Game Jam exclusive! (apparently)

What at the controls? It's a point and click, baby! But if you buy a Nexa instead of a house, you can make it anything you want!
